title: Misplacement Game - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Horror   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Bisexual Protagonist   Carefree Protagonist   Comedic Undertone   Curious Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Devoted Love Interests   Episodic   Game Elements   Ghosts   Gore   Handsome Male Lead   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Lack of Common Sense   Male Yandere   Modern Day   Multiple Realms   Multiple Transported Individuals   Playful Protagonist   Possessive Characters   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Shameless Protagonist   Spirits   Strong Love Interests   Survival Game   System Administrator   Transplanted Memories   Unlimited Flow   World Hopping
author: Teng Yuan Xin   藤原欣
description:
The protagonist is a face-con – he likes good-looking people, can’t say no to a pretty visage and is filled with thoughts of love. One day he bonded with a target-capture system where he can travel from world to world and experience love with the most handsome (key point!) target!

The number of players in each game is not set. The protagonist has only one target – the most handsome one. As he falls in love, he realizes… the other players perhaps, maybe, probably… have Horror? Survival? Escape-type games?>
